name: NHL 2K10
description:
2K Sports is unleashing the next generation of the NHL 2K franchise - NHL 2K10. True hockey fans will respect the attention to detail. And with pick-up-and-shoot controls anyone can play. Which is why NHL 2K10 IS PARTY NOW!

Features

DELIVER YOUR BEATDOWNS ONLINE
NHL 2K10 delivers full online support. So now you can create online teams, play in leagues, update rosters and run your mouth over Wii Speak. You can even bring more people to the party with multi-console action that supports up to 5 players per team.
CONTROL THE PUCK
New responsive game controls make NHL 2K10 more realistic than ever. Wii Motion Plus means precise, one-to-one motion control over puck handling, shooting and defensive gameplay. The new stumble shot engine lets you get shots off in any situation. And the stick lift feature helps dial up your defensive tenacity.
SEE EVERY CUT, BRUISE AND MISSING TOOTH
With an optimized graphics engine built just for Wii, NHL 2K10 features brighter arenas, vivid colors, more accurate players and faces, 60 frames per second gameplay and the kind of attention to detail that’ll let you count the scruffy hairs on Ovechkin’s face.
SERIOUS HOCKEY I.Q.
Visual Concepts has spent the past season fine-tuning NHL 2K10’s A.I. to let you set up more realistic plays, move the puck around the ice more easily and, most importantly, bring out the best in multi-player gameplay. Smart hockey is good hockey.
Mii VS. EVERYBODY
Mii Superskills Mode lets you compete in a series of events inspired by the NHL All-Star Skills Competition. Throw your own Mii party and show your friends whose Mii is boss.

As of May 20, 2014, the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection service for Nintendo DSi and Wii systems has been retired. Online features of this game are no longer available after this date but this game still provides an entertaining experience in offline mode.
